name: NSCollectionLayoutItem
desc: The most basic component of a collection view's layout.

items.name: init(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize)
items.desc: Creates an item of the specified size.

items.name: init(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, supplementaryItems: [NSCollectionLayoutSupplementaryItem])
items.desc: Creates an item of the specified size with an array of supplementary items to attach to the item.

items.name: var layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize
items.desc: The item's size expressed in width and height dimensions.

items.name: var supplementaryItems: [NSCollectionLayoutSupplementaryItem]
items.desc: An array of the supplementary items attached to the item.

items.name: var edgeSpacing: NSCollectionLayoutEdgeSpacing?
items.desc: The amount of space added around the boundaries of the item between other items and this item's container.

items.name: var contentInsets: NSDirectionalEdgeInsets
items.desc: The amount of space added around the content of the item to adjust its final size after its position is computed.
